statements: SELECT * FROM CreditData WHERE loan_approved = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM CreditData WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, interest_rate FROM CreditData WHERE loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM CreditData WHERE interest_rate < 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditData WHERE loan_approved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM CreditData WHERE loan_approved = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM CreditData WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM CreditData WHERE loan_amount > 50000 AND credit_score > 600 ORDER BY interest_rate ASC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, credit_score FROM CreditData WHERE loan_approved = TRUE AND interest_rate < 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, credit_score FROM CreditData WHERE loan_approved = FALSE AND loan_amount < 10000;
SELECT * FROM LoanData;
SELECT id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM LoanData WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM LoanData ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT credit_score, last_updated FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanData GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM LoanData WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM LoanData WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM LoanData INNER JOIN CreditScores ON LoanData.customer_id = CreditScores.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS loan_count, AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM LoanData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(credit_score) AS highest_credit_score FROM CreditScores GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY highest_credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT borrower_id, name, address FROM borrowers;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT name, email FROM borrowers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, name, address FROM borrowers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score >= 700 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, borrowers.name FROM loans JOIN borrowers ON loans.borrower_id = borrowers.borrower_id;
SELECT borrowers.name, credit_scores.credit_history FROM borrowers JOIN credit_scores ON borrowers.borrower_id = credit_scores.borrower_id WHERE credit_scores.credit_score < 600;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_rating FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, loan_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'Approved' AND loan_amount > 5000
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND loan_amount < 10000 ORDER BY loan_date ASC
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.customer_id, loans.loan_amount, credit_scores.credit_score, credit_scores.credit_rating FROM loans JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id

SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.customer_id, loans.loan_amount, loans.loan_date, credit_scores.credit_score, credit_scores.credit_rating FROM loans LEFT JOIN credit_scores ON loans.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_id DESC, loan_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_date FROM loans WHERE loan_status='Approved' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_rating IN ('Good', 'Excellent') ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status='Pending' AND loan_amount <= 10000;
